00518     enum AusgabCall {
00519         BeforeTransport = 0,     
00520         EgsCut = 1,              
00521         PegsCut = 2,             
00522         UserDiscard = 3,         
00523         ExtraEnergy = 4,         
00525         AfterTransport = 5,      
00526         BeforeBrems = 6,         
00527         AfterBrems = 7,

00529         AfterMoller = 9,         
00530         BeforeBhabha = 10,       
00531         AfterBhabha = 11,        
00532         BeforeAnnihFlight = 12,  
00533         AfterAnnihFlight = 13,

00535         AfterAnnihRest = 14,     
00536         BeforePair = 15,         
00537         AfterPair = 16,

00550         BeforePhotoNuc = 29,      
00551         AfterPhotoNuc = 30,

00589     inline int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00590                       EGS_Float &t, int *newmed) {
00591 
00592         geometry->resetErrorFlag();
00593         EGS_Float twant = t;
00594         int inew = geometry->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed);
00595         storeGeometryStep(ireg,inew,x,u,twant,t);
00596         if (geometry->getLastError()) {
00597             reportGeometryError();
00598         }
00599         return inew;
00600 
00601         //return geometry->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed);
00602     };
00603 
00608     inline EGS_Float hownear(int ireg,const EGS_Vector &x) {
00609         return geometry->hownear(ireg,x);
00610     };
00611

01062 
01063 #define APP_MAIN(app_name) \
01064     int main(int argc, char **argv) { \
01065         app_name app(argc,argv); \
01066         int err = app.initSimulation(); \
01067         if( err ) return err; \
01068         err = app.runSimulation(); \
01069         if( err < 0 ) return err; \
01070         return app.finishSimulation(); \
01071     }
01072 
01073 #define APP_SIMPLE_MAIN(app_name) \
01074     int main(int argc, char **argv) { \
01075         app_name app(argc,argv); \
01076         app.run(); \
01077         app.reportResults(); \
01078         app.finish(); \
01079         return 0; \
01080     }
01081 
01082 #define APP_LIB(app_name) \
01083     extern "C" {\
01084         APP_EXPORT EGS_Application* createApplication(int argc, char **argv) {\
01085             return new app_name(argc,argv);\
01086         }\
01087     }
